div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2302 La Goulette, 5 km. S of anc. Car- thage, Tunisia, 1920 Burial: c. 146 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 12 AR Carthage: tetradr. of Carthage mint (as SNGCop. 403-6) Disposition: unknown Note by E. S. G. Robinson in BM, from informa- tion provided by M. Paul Bédé of Sfax
